item.title: Icons
item.description: Blowfish has built-in support for a number of icons. These can be included in your website through either the [ Additionally, custom icons are also fully supported. Simply provide your own SVG icon assets by placing them in the assets/icons/ directory in the root of your project.

item.title: Diagrams and Flowcharts
